author: Carol Thomas
text: If you're a praying person, I desperately need to find my checkbook! Please pray for God to help me locate my checkbook quickly... as I have bills to pay! Thank you! Amen.

author: Carol Thomas
text: Dear AOL... you advertise your tech support as 24/7 this is a lie. You send me a Special Password, but, when I use it, I'm told it's invalid. You tell me to try again; bur, you limit to waiting for 24 hours to try again. THIS STINKS!!!

author: Carol Thomas
text: This the only space where I can openly say, May the 4th be with you!"

author: Carol Thomas
text: My AOL & Gmail are both locked up... still. So, I'm running away, a little bit, & diving back in at the beginning, reading "Outlander!" https://t.co/fZUt6UiWrw

author: Carol Thomas
text: Dear AOL... I cannot receive your messages, because you have my account locked! 🤬

author: Carol Thomas
text: I am beyond worn out... too much UNNDCESSARY stress in my life -- courtesy of AOL & my bank!! 🤬 I am all too very close to simply being done with all this outside electronic crap!! 🤬

author: Carol Thomas
text: Dear God... PLEASE HELP ME "FIX" ALL THE ONLINE STRUGGKES I'M HAVING!! I DESPERATELY NEED YOUR DIVINE HELP?!? PLEASE?!? AMEN.

author: Carol Thomas
text: I am SO FAR BRYOND FRUSTRAYED & FED UP WITH FB & AOL!!! THEY HAVE ME LOCKED OUT OF MY ACCOUNTS & I CAN'T SEEM TO GET ANY HELP TO UNTANGLE THE MESS!!!!  🥴😵‍💫😭

author: Carol Thomas
text: Just a moment of encouragement. 🙌 That’s it. That’s the tweet. #ShareKindness

author: Carol Thomas
text: Could two followers please copy and re-post this tweet? I'm trying to demonstrate that someone is always there, especially at this time of year. Call 833-456-4566 (National Suicide Prevention Helpline CDA). Just two. Any two. Copy, not retweet. Let’s all look out for each other.

author: Carol Thomas
text: I spent much of the day trying to re-set all of my bill payments... with NO success!! I'd think that businesses would make it easier to pay their bills!! But, NO!! It's actually HARDER!! I am SO frustrated & I'm feeling  defeated. 😭

author: Carol Thomas
text:
Sam Heughan is a brilliant actor and an exceptional good looking guy.
One does not negate the other.
#SamHeughan
